questions.name: Enter any other name you are known by
questions.instructions: For example, if your name is “Sandra” and you go by “Sandy,” or your name is “Robert” and you go by “Rob,” write it down here.

questions.name: Select one of the following reasons why you are applying for Pandemic Unemployment Assistance
questions.instructions: If none of the following are true, you can't apply for unemployment through this form. Please look into your state unemployment insurance application for further options.

options.name: You are unable to work because you have been diagnosed with COVID-19 or are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 and are seeking a medical diagnosis.
You are unable to work because a member of your household has been diagnosed with COVID-19.
You are unable to work because you are providing critical care for a family member or a member of the individual’s household who has been diagnosed with COVID-19.

You are unable to work because a child or other person in the household for which you have primary caregiving responsibility is unable to attend school or another facility that is closed as a direct result of the COVID-19 public health emergency and such school or facility care is required for you to work.
You are unable to reach your place of employment because of a quarantine imposed as a direct result of the COVID-19 public health emergency.
You are unable to reach your place of employment because you have been advised by a health care provider to self-quarantine due to concerns related to COVID-19.
You were scheduled to begin employment and are no longer able to do so as a direct result of COVID-19.
You have become the breadwinner after the primary head of household passed away as a direct result of COVID-19.
You have had to quit your job as a direct result of COVID-19.
Your place of employment is closed as a direct result of the COVID-19 public health emergency.

You are an individual who works as an independent contractor with reportable income and are unemployed, partially employed, or unable or unavailable to work because the COVID-19 public health emergency has severely limited your ability to continue performing your customary work activities, and has thereby forced you to suspend such activities.

questions.name: My mailing address is the same as my home address.
Telephone Number
questions.instructions: Provide the telephone number where we can best reach you with questions about your claim.

questions.name: Cell Phone Number
questions.instructions: This is optional. By providing your cell phone number, you agree to allow the Department to send you communications which may include: important information regarding Unemployment Insurance programs, job recruitment opportunities that may be suitable for you, information on available jobs that may be suitable for you, and available skills training opportunities.

questions.name: Enter your email address:
questions.instructions: This is optional. By providing your email, you agree to allow the Department to send you communications which may include: questions relative to the Unemployment Insurance claim you filed, important information regarding Unemployment Insurance programs, job recruitment opportunities that may be suitable for you, information on available jobs that may be suitable for you, and available training opportunities. Your email, if provided, will also be used to send you your confirmation code for your Unemployment Insurance application. Please double-check that it is correct.

questions.name: Preferred Language
questions.instructions: What language should we use in followup communications.

questions.name: Prior to becoming unemployed due to COVID-19, were you employed or self-employed as a part of a family unit (or in the same self-employment business as your family members)?
In your present, or most recent employment, are you also a Corporate Officer?
questions.instructions: A corporate officer is a high-level management official of a corporation or an unincorporated business, such as a president, vice president, secretary, financial officer or chief executive officer (CEO).

pages.title: Employment History
pages.instructions:
Please provide your employment history for your most relevant employer (such as your largest or most common client or business in your capacity as a gig worker, contract worker, small business owner, worker for hire, or self-employed individual) during the last 18 months.
If you're self-employed, you are your own employer and should enter that information.

questions.name: Employer name
questions.instructions: This may be the Corporate name; verify name on pay stub.

questions.name: How many of the last 18 months were you working for this employer?
Last actual Day of Work*
questions.instructions: Please provide the last day you actually performed work for your employer.

questions.name: Did you work for this employer full-time, part-time or on a staggered schedule?

options.name: I work or worked for this employer full-time.
I work or worked for this employer part-time.
I work or worked for this employer on a staggered schedule.

questions.name: What was your rate of pay?
Please provide a detailed description of your job duties with this employer (including machines and equipment used, etc.).
Are you currently receiving sick leave, paid time off, or other benefits from your employer equal to your normal salary or pay?
Are you currently teleworking for this employer and receiving your full salary or pay?
Did you work for this employer for at least four (4) weeks and did you earn at least $[TODO: insert value] per week?
